titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House on the death of the Honorable Steven Schiff, a Representative from the State of New Mexico.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/25/1998--Introduced. Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Steven Schiff, a Representative from the State of New Mexico.
